articles.author: Udit Misra
articles.title: How RBI fell behind the curve on containing inflation - The Indian Express
articles.description: The RBI is by law responsible for maintaining price stability. Under the “inflation-targeting” regime that began in 2016, the central bank is required to target an inflation rate of 4 per cent, with a leeway of 2 percentage points on either side.

articles.title: Another Mistry rises at Tata trusts | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The induction of Mehli Mistry, the estranged first cousin of the late Cyrus Mistry, on the boards of trusts, offers a view into how Ratan Tata, 84, is entrusting key allies with responsibilities.
